about_the_game:
Bad guys are approaching you from both sides, you must react quickly to defeat them and defend yourself. Don't just click on the screen randomly, every punch matters in this fight! Be a master of kung-fu fight, and train your fingers to quickly respond to a threat. As you pass the levels, enemies become more challenging to fight, but practice will make you a perfect fighter. Are you ready for some real kung fu action?

In the electric world where the clash of fists reigns, Finger Fury Showdown, a genre-defining indie brawler brings the art of kung fu to your fingertips. Master intuitive combat, strategically enhance your fighter, and immerse yourself in adrenaline-fueled challenges that demand skill and quick reflexes. Beware of your moves because, in this 2D fighting game, every punch, every strike, and every kick is essential for your survival. Will you be a winner or a defeated one?
Epic Features:

🥊 Electrifying Action:
Engage in bone-crushing battles that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Feel every hit as you immerse yourself in the visceral combat experience.

🥊 Skill-Based Progression:
No luck, no chance, just pure skill. Advance through levels, each designed to test your fighting finesse and quick-thinking tactics.

🥊 Master the Art of Kung Fu:
Hone your skills, strategize your moves, and demonstrate the true power of a kung fu master. It's not just a game - it's a journey to mastery.

🥊 Upgrade your fighter:
Boost health for survival, extend your strike range, and earn more from each conquered foe. Forge your path to victory by tailoring your fighter's strengths, ensuring no enemy can stand in your way.

🥊 Challenging enemies
Beware of who you fight and how: different enemies, different strategies!

🥊 Mind-blowing animation:
Get hooked with breathtaking graphics and fluid animations, immersing you in intense, bone-crushing conflicts. Every battle is a visually captivating experience!

💥 Feel that adrenaline rush? Start delivering your best punches now!
